content: From https://github.com/WebAssembly/WASI/blob/main/legacy/application-abi.md a reactor module will have its _initialize called. If a reactor componet is linked and instantiated as a component, then _initialize is not called. Why is that? Is it just because it's not been done yet or am I confusing reactor modules with reactor omponents?
I know I've asked similar questions before, but I want to explain it to a third person and I'm not sure I know what I'm talking about.
